paper_abstract: Extreme-scale plasma turbulence studies offer new insights on confinement scaling in magnetic fusion systems by using powerful, world-class supercomputers to run simulations with unprecedented resolution and temporal duration. The studies also shed light on how the turbulent transport of heat and particles in the plasma and the associated confinement scale from present-generation devices to much larger ITER-size plasmas.
paper_title: Scientific Discovery in Fusion Plasma Turbulence Simulations at Extreme Scale
